resources.text: Words and phrases: topics include conversational phrases, domestic animals, singular vs. plural, numerals, possessives, directionals, etc.. Tyler, Guy (researcher); Lucero, Elsie (consultant). 1964. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 210.001

resources.text: Words and phrases continued: topics include the weather, geographic features, vehicles, agriculture, meals, verbs, kinds of jewlery, adjectives, etc.. Tyler, Guy (researcher); Lucero, Elsie (consultant). 1964. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 210.002

resources.text: Words and phrases continued: topics include conversational phrases, colors, clothing, candy, animals, plants, insects, furniture, weather, geography, cardinal directions, greetings, etc.. Tyler, Guy (researcher); Lucero, Elsie (consultant). 1964. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 210.003

resources.text: Words and phrases: topics include speaking and knowing Isleta, adjectives, pronouns, verbal paradigms, conversational phrases, questions and answers, etc.. Tyler, Guy (researcher); Lucero, Elsie (consultant). 1968. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 210.004

resources.text: Discussion in English of two books published by the Smithsonian about Isleta artists ("The artists of Isleta paintings in Pueblo society" and "Isleta paintings"). Includes pronunciation of some Isleta words from the books. Tyler, Guy (researcher); Lucero, Elsie (consultant). 1968. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 210.005

resources.text: Words and phrases: topics include seeing, hearing, listening, talking, saying, telling, looking, smelling, tasting, etc.. Tyler, Guy (researcher); Lucero, Elsie (consultant). 1968. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 210.006

resources.text: Words and phrases continued: topics include tasting, eating, drinking, running, winning, gambling, complaining, helping, having, repairing, ruining, kicking, etc. (many miscellaneous verbs). Tyler, Guy (researcher); Lucero, Elsie (consultant). 1968. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 210.007

resources.text: Words and phrases continued: topics include tense and time expressions (phrases about yesterday, tomorrow), comparatives/superlatives, picking, privacy, etc.. Tyler, Guy (researcher); Lucero, Elsie (consultant). 1968. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 210.008

resources.text: Words and phrases continued: topics include privacy, farming, right vs. wrong, language, rain, fish, etc.. Tyler, Guy (researcher); Lucero, Elsie (consultant). 1968. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 210.009

resources.text: Words and phrases: topics include rivers, crossing a river, plants, fires, etc.. Tyler, Guy (researcher); Lucero, Pauline (consultant). 1968. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 210.010
